about_the_game:
This Demo includes a portion of the features and contents that will be available on the Early Access version of the game. The release of the Early Access is coming on May 26, so we'll save your account and progress until then!

DEMO FEATURES & CONTENTS

  • Unique tactical gameplay with complex strategic options:
    - Sacrifice cards from your hand or your board to build up your resources
    - Play up to two cards per turn
    - Bring sacrificed cards back to the game for the most unexpected critical plays
    - Full replenishment of your 4-card hand at the beginning of your turn
    - Take advantage of special effects that allow you to draw, sacrifice, play and bring additional cards back to the game
    - ‘Leader’s Decisions’: use each Leader’s unique set of powerful skill to change the course of the game
    - And more!
  • Multiple paths to victory.
  • Choose between 4 powers and playable Leaders.
  • Over 250 cards.
  • Casual and vs IA modes.
  • Keep your account and progress for the Early Access release!

name: Causa, Voices of the Dusk Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 /10 (32-bit or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-3225/AMD A8-7650K
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640/Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Causa, Voices of the Dusk is a strategy-packed card game in which your decisions will change the course of the game. Sacrifice cards to raise your Cause, and bring them back later for powerful plays. Prove your abilities in a dynamic yet highly strategic gameplay with countless tactical options.
